name: Kind of value set
description: Identifies the value set as belonging to a particular set.  For example "demographics", "lab", "clinical research", etc.  Might also be used to tie a value set to particular usage projects.

element.formal: Identifies the value set as belonging to a particular set.  For example "demographics", "lab", "clinical research", etc.  Might also be used to tie a value set to particular usage projects.
element.comments: The categories chosen will vary widely depending on the purpose of the value set repository.

binding.name: ValueSetCategory
binding.description: Classifications for valuesets.  Can include such concepts as "demographics", "lab", "clinical research".  Might also be used to tie a value set to particular usage projects
